title: Joined io.js Docker Working Group
body:
io.js Docker Working Group is responsible for maintaining the
  official Docker Image for io.js.

title: Joined io.js Norway
body:
io.js Norway is responsible for managing the Norwegian io.js
  community and translating official io.js documents and publications to
  Norwegian.

title: Released s3-uploader for Node.JS
body:
Easy and conenient resize, rename, and upload images with multiple
  versions to AWS S3.

title: Recieved MongoDB Certification
body:
MongoDB is an open-source document database that provides high
  performance, high availability, and automatic scaling.

title: Started learning Docker (v0.6)
body:
Docker is an open-source project that automates the deployment of
  applications inside software containers, by providing an additional layer of
  abstraction and automation of operating-system-level virtualization on
  Linux.

title: Released Routing for Leaflet
body:
Leaflet.Routing is a routing controller for the popular Leaflet
  mapping framework. The module provides an intuitive interface for routing
  paths between waypoints using any user specified routing service.

title: Started learning Node.JS (v0.8)
body:
Node.js provides an event-driven architecture and a non-blocking I/O
  API that optimizes an application's throughput and scalability. These
  technologies are commonly used for real-time web applications.

title: Joined UT.no Project Team
body:
Hit the trails with UT.no, a collaboration between the Norwegian
  Broadcasting Corporation (NRK) and the Norwegian Trekking Association (DNT).
  Search the map and find cabins, leisure activities, and great tips in
  Norwegian mountains.
